page.title: 08The Causeway - Kennoway
page.content: { The Causeway,}or{"Causie"}as it is known locally, is the original main street of Kennoway. It starts just north of Sandy Brae and leads uphill to end behind the Swan Hotel in the centre of the village. The Causeway ceased to be the main road in the 1950's when New Road was constructed immediately to the east to take its place. The "Causie" is virtually all that is left of the old settlement and many of the structures which remain are listed buildings. Two of the most historic houses are Forbes House, where a Dr Forbes once held his surgery, and Seton House, where Captain Seton lived. There is a house still with no gas, electricity or toilet facilities in which an old man has lived since his birth.
